contentList.content: A simple bag, loosely tied. In it you will find various kits and handy tools used during adventuring.
Rich carvings decorate the experior of this beech wood chest, built to accommodate archery armaments. Enhanced with a bit of magic, it weights less and is significantly more spacious than expected.
A reinforced walnut wood chest built to accommodate various size armors. Humming with magic, its interior appears unrealisticly spacious.
This bag hums with magic and has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions.
A strong sulphurous smell emanates from this container, packed to the brim with smokepowder and other volatile elements.
The musty yellow smell of old paper and crumbling scrolls wafts glumly from this bag.
Formerly part of a wardrobe, this yew box has several compartments for storing rolled up cloaks in a convenient way.
This leather pouch is filled with vials of toxins, powders, and extracts, as well as spoons for measuring correct dosages.
This small leather sack keeps valuables such as coins and gems protected from the elements during travel.
This richly decorated rosewood casket allows for the dignified storage of dead bodies, preserving them for a long time.
A neat little organizer, equipped with velvet pillows and leather straps to protect and store dyes.
This small wooden chest has intricate carvings symbolizing different kinds of footwear. Opening it reveals several smaller sections that are perfect for storing various sized shoes and boots.
A small box made out of teak. Inside there are several drawers perfect to host various sizes of gloves and bracers.
This metal container is crammed with items that can be lobbed at others. Given the volatility of its contents, this box ought to be handled carefully.
This rounded wooden box contains several padded sticks to store various sized headwear, ranging from hats to helmets. Its modest external dimensions masquerade the vast space encountered on opening.
This exquisitely-crafted chest, ornamented with gems and lined with cushioned velvet, is fit for storing the finest instruments of Faerun securely. Enhanced with a bit of magic for weight reduction.
Made of precious stone and covered in gold, this chest is both sturdy and pleasing to the eye. There is enough space in it to hold several precious items such as necklaces and rings.

This chest's fire-hardened wood and thick iron reinforcements offer exceptional protection for your melee armaments. Enchanted to protect its contents from rusting and expand storage space significantly.
Typically carried by traveling healers, this case allows the user to strap delicate potion bottles to its cushioned side with numerous leather thongs for safe storage during travel.
This old urn repurposed into a quiver is ideally suited for holding arrows or bolts.
This sturdy container allows dozens of scrolls to be placed in it, safe from exposure to fire, rain, or lighting; common hazards faced by any adventuring wizard.
A large chest made of oak that has multiple horizontal compartments, padded to store shields. Magic on the chest expand storage space and keep its items free of rust or other harm.
A cushioned teddy bear with seemingly endless stuffing, wearable with hands that fold around your body. Huggable!
An odd shaped container is said to be a remnant portal to the astral that has been repurposed as a container for relevant memorabilia and items.
A seemingly bottomless chest, constructed from large planks of acacia. Careful hands have created long compartments ideal for the storage of various thrown weapons, such as spears and javelins.
Made of mahogany, this formidable wardrobe is spacious enough to hold several sets of shirts, robes and undergarments with ease.
